channel.title: could on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in could on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-02
item.description: Google Soli Radar sees your intentions – and it’s less creepy and more helpful than you think (3 minute read) Google’s ATAP group recently unveiled its latest Soli Radar research project.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-07
item.description: Google Stream is what Stadia should have been from the start (3 minute read) Google Stream is a backend cloud gaming technology that Google is pitching to businesses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-03
item.description: Twitter reportedly working on new feature to let users write full articles (2 minute read) Twitter Articles is a new experimental feature that will let Twitter users write longer texts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-27
item.description: iPhone took top slot in China in holiday quarter, with highest ever market share (2 minute read) Apple hit a 23% market share in China in Q4, 2021, thanks to the success of the iPhone 13.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-24
item.description: Leak reveals Microsoft’s canceled Windows OS for dual-screen devices (2 minute read) Microsoft was working on a secret pocketable Surface device powered by a custom Windows OS before turning to Android for its Surface Duo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-12
item.description: Locket, an app for sharing photos to friends’ homescreens, hits the top of the App Store (5 minute read) Locket is an app that turns Apple’s widget system into a private social networking platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-17
item.description: Apple reportedly wants to make its own wireless chips for the iPhone (2 minute read) Apple is opening an office in southern California and hiring engineers to work on wireless radios, radio-frequency integrated circuits, and a wireless SoC.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-16
item.description: Reddit files to take the company public (1 minute read) Reddit has started the process of going public by filing a confidential S-1 with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-29
item.description: Apple still working on multi-device charger, a future where all devices ‘can charge each other’ (2 minute read) Apple is working on a multi-device charger for its products as well as short and long-distance wireless charging.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-15
item.description: Tesla starts deploying Starlink satellite internet systems at Supercharger stations (2 minute read) Tesla has started to deploy Starlink antennas at its Supercharger stations.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-12
item.description: Spotify is acquiring an audiobook company (3 minute read) Spotify has announced plans to acquire Findaway for an undisclosed price.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-07
item.description: Amazon is reportedly planning to release an Amazon-branded TV as soon as October (1 minute read) Amazon is planning to release Amazon-branded TVs as soon as October in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-09
item.description: Square is going to make a hardware wallet for bitcoin (1 minute read) Square is making a hardware wallet for bitcoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-28
item.description: Amazon Introduces Tiny ‘ZenBooths’ for Stressed Out Warehouse Workers (3 minute read) Amazon is introducing tiny booths for its workers to momentarily escape from their jobs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-03
item.description: Apple Watch Could Gain Breakthrough Health Upgrade (2 minute read) Rockley Photonics produces sensors for the Apple Watch.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-27
item.description: Apple to establish North Carolina campus, increase U.S. spending targets (2 minute read) Apple will establish a new campus in North Carolina, expand its operation in several other US states, and increase its spending targets with US suppliers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-01
item.description: Apple adds two brand new Siri voices and will no longer default to a female or male voice in iOS (3 minute read) Siri will no longer default to a female voice in English.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-23
item.description: Apple’s HomePod mini reportedly has a secret temperature and humidity sensor (2 minute read) Apple’s HomePod mini smart speaker has a secret temperature and humidity sensor in its casing.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-16
item.description: Amazon expands gamification program that encourages warehouse employees to work harder (3 minute read) FC Games is a program that gamifies warehouse work for Amazon workers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-04
item.description: Netflix has created a TikTok clone that lets people scroll through funny clips (2 minute read) Fast Laughs is a new mobile feature from Netflix that plays short clips from shows directly inside the Netflix app.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-11
item.description: Facebook is reportedly working on a Clubhouse copy (1 minute read) Facebook is in the early stages of developing a Clubhouse clone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-01
item.description: Apple just paid a record $25 million to buy a Sundance movie (2 minute read) Apple paid roughly $25 million for a movie at the Sundance Film Festival, the largest deal ever at the event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-29
item.description: Robinhood, Interactive Brokers restrict trading in GameStop stock and options (7 minute read) Robinhood took steps to restrict the trading in GameStop stock and other related securities.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-28
item.description: Tesla Model S refreshed with a radically redesigned interior and 520-mile range (3 minute read) Tesla has unveiled its long-rumored refresh for its Model S sedan.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-14
item.description: Google trained a trillion-parameter AI language model (5 minute read) Generally speaking, the more parameters a machine learning model has, the better it is at its task.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-07
item.description: Microsoft Could Bring You Back From The Dead… As A Chat Bot (1 minute read) Microsoft has filed a patent for a method that would use social data such as images, voice data, social media posts, and other written media to build a profile of a person and create a chatbot with the personality of that person.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-31
item.description: Amazon acquires podcast network Wondery (1 minute read) Podcast network Wondery will soon become part of Amazon Music.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-07
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has told friends and associates he plans to move to Texas (4 minute read) Elon Musk has told several of his close friends and associates that he is planning to move to Texas.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-27
item.description: Salesforce is in talks to buy Slack, deal could be announced next week (2 minute read) Slack shares closed almost 38% higher on Wednesday after it was reported that Salesforce was in talks to acquire the company.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-25
item.description: SpaceX Starlink engineers take questions in Reddit AMA—here are highlights (5 minute read) SpaceX Starlink engineers took part in a Reddit AMA on Saturday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-23
item.description: Charli D’Amelio hits 100 million TikTok followers (3 minute read) Charli D’Amelio has reached 100 million followers on TikTok.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-19
item.description: Nokia wins NASA contract to put a 4G network on the moon (1 minute read) Nokia has been awarded a $14.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-07
item.description: Driving the Polestar 2, the first electric car with a brain by Google (8 minute read) The Polestar 2 is a new luxury electric vehicle from Volvo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-02
item.description: Dating app Bumble preparing for an IPO above $6 billion (1 minute read) Bumble is preparing for an Initial Public Offering early next year, possibly seeking a valuation of between $6 billion to $8 billion.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-18
item.description: Apple Threatens to Terminate Epic Games’ Developer Accounts on August 28 (3 minute read) Apple plans to terminate Epic Games’ access to its App Store and app development tools by August 28.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-06
item.description: Samsung announces the Galaxy Z Fold 2 with bigger screens and better cameras (2 minute read) The new Galaxy Z fold 2 handset was officially announced at Samsung’s Unpacked event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-22
item.description: LinkedIn cuts 960 jobs as pandemic puts the brakes on corporate hiring (1 minute read) LinkedIn reported on Tuesday that it would cut about 960 jobs due to the sustained impact that the coronavirus pandemic is having on the demand for its recruitment products.
